docblock.description: Defines Writer interface.
Represents an output "device" for resources.
Provides an output to an image resource.

tag.name: param
tag.description: (optional) A path where to save the resource.

tag.name: param
tag.description: (optional) The quality of generated image. Its value MUST be in a range from 0 to 100.

tag.name: param
tag.description: (optional) Additional parameters passed to the concrete implementation method.

tag.name: throws
tag.description: If cannot write the contents on file system.

docblock.description: Obtains the Resource instance in which this object is working on.
Obtains the Resource instance in which this object is working on.
Defines WriterFactory class.
Defines an abstract implementation of a input "device" for resources.
Returns a concrete instance of a Writer based on the file extension `$type`.
docblock.long-description:
Note:

For custom implementations of Writer interface, it must follow the convention:

\GdWrapper\Io\Writer\<TYPE>Writer

Notice that <TYPE> MUST be in StudlyCaps.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The type of the image that will be written.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The image resource that will be written.

docblock.description: Defines JpgWritter class.
Defines an implementation of a I/O device for JPEG files.
docblock.long-description: Because JPEG files can have .jpg and .jpeg extensions, this class is needed for the right operation of ReaderFactory, which tries to create a reader based on a file extension.

docblock.description: Defines JpegWritter class.
Defines an implementation of a I/O device for JPEG files.
Outputs an image resource with `imagejpeg` function.

tag.name: param
tag.description: (optional) A `string` containing a path to a writable file on file system or `null` if you want send the output to the browser.

{@inheritdoc}

tag.name: param
tag.description: (optional) The quality of generated image. Its value MUST be in a range from 0 to 100. Otherwise, it will be converted using `$quality % 101`

docblock.description: Defines ReaderFactory class.
